long_description: Soft and warm, the men's REI Merino Wool Full-Zip Sweater provides natural comfort and moisture control for everyday wear, hiking and other outdoor activities in a variety of weather conditions. Lightweight and breathable merino wool wicks away moisture and helps regulate body temperature; it's also naturally odor resistant. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Comfortable touches include flatseam construction and shoulder seams placed to prevent discomfort under pack straps. Full front zipper offers ventilation options. An active fit gives the men's REI Merino Wool Full-Zip Sweater a full range of motion.
short_description: Soft and warm, the men's REI Merino Wool Full-Zip Sweater provides natural comfort and moisture control for everyday wear, hiking and other outdoor activities in a variety of weather conditions.
